source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT ISNULL(MAX(FORMAT(START_TIME,'yyyyMMddHHmmss')),'20170101010000') AS MSTIME FROM dbo.ETLLOGEXT
	WHERE PL_NAME = 'PL_DELTA_EXTRACTION' AND OBJ_NAME = 'CUST_SRC' AND STAT = 'SUCCESS'

activities.name: Split and set list of Subjects
